item.title: Four people have been injured in a car ramming and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester, UK. The suspect was shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #BreakingNews #BBCNews
item.description: Four people have been injured in a car ramming and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester, UK. The suspect was shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: Four people have been injured and Greater Manchester Mayor Andy Burnham says the suspect is believed to be dead. The incident comes on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish religious calendar. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #Breaki

item.title: Two people have died after a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish calendar. The suspect is believed to be dead after being shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchester #GreaterManchesterPolic
